title: cmd/godoc: package builtin should not list functions under types
body:
by **adilh@google.com**: 
On this page under the Index section:
http://golang.org/pkg/builtin/

the built-in functions cap, copy, and len are all indented after int.  This looks like a
mistake since it makes it look like these are methods on int.  Why are these indented?

I'm used to quickly scanning the documentation for indented functions to find methods on
the parent receiver, so this is confusing.  Thanks!
